Basic.front: Which actor plays the title role in the feature film 'Deadpool'?
In the movie 'Deadpool', what is the title character's real name?
In the movie 'Deadpool', the title character crosses the barrier between character and audience.  What is the term for this imagined barrier?
What is the name of the blind 'Deadpool' character who is Wade Wilson's roommate?
Who was the 44th president of the United States?
Which character is the primary villain in the movie 'Deadpool'?
What is Deadpool's primary super power?
Which character in the movie 'Deadpool' is Wade Wilson's love interest?
Which 'Deadpool' character says, 'Love is blind, Wade?'
Who was the first president of the United States?
Which 'Deadpool' villain is really named Francis?
Which aircraft do Colossus and Negasonic Teenage Warhead fly in the movie 'Deadpool'?
Which 'Deadpool' character does actor T.J. Miller play in the film?

Cloze.fulltext: Ryan Reynolds plays the title role in the feature film 'Deadpool'.
In the movie 'Deadpool', Wade Wilson is the title character's real name.
In the movie 'Deadpool', the title character crosses the barrier between character and audience.  The term for this imagined barrier is the fourth wall.
Blind Al is the name of the blind 'Deadpool' character who is Wade Wilson's roommate.
Ajax is the primary villain in the movie 'Deadpool'.
George Washington was the first president of the United States.
Deadpool's primary super power is super healing.
In the movie 'Deadpool', Vanessa Carlysle is Wade Wilson's love interest.
In the movie'Deadpool', Blind Al says, 'Love is blind, Wade.'
Barrack Obama was the 44th president of the United States.
The movie 'Deadpool' was banned in China.
In 'Deadpool', the villain Ajax is really named Francis.
Colossus and Negasonic Teenage Warhead fly Blackbird in the movie 'Deadpool'.
In the movie 'Deadpool', actor T.J. Miller plays the character Weasel.
